@chaosxeras Can you explain what broken means?
Hi jlewi, here you go

Thanks @chaosxeras Looks like an easy fix; looks like the doc is located here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/website/blob/master/content/docs/other-guides/virtual-dev/getting-started-minikube.md>https://github.com/kubeflow/website/blob/master/content/docs/other-guides/virtual-dev/getting-started-minikube.md</denchmark-link>
Images are here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/website/tree/master/content/docs/started>https://github.com/kubeflow/website/tree/master/content/docs/started</denchmark-link>
We should probably move the PNGs into the same directory @chaosxeras any interest in submitting a PR to fix this?
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> , I have not done that before haha. Sorry, I'll leave it to you

it's not also <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/1156>#1156</denchmark-link> I wont do it. Make sure to check on Docsy example app, it can save time. Instead, I started build a new website for Kubeflow. Sometime bit modern and with less boilerplates code. will post the link with more update.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mosn>@mosn</denchmark-link> why isn't this a good-first-issue? It should be a pretty straightforward fix of the markdown docs and possible relocating some files in the source tree. Where does docsy come into play here? Once you open a PR the presubmits will create a preview that can be used to verify its working.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> I will give it another shot. I guess I am a bit confused with the Hugo project and it backfired here.
I' d like to open a PR for this.
